name: Veriwell
description: Verifying wellness advice. VeriWell is an AI tool that lets you check the validity of health claims made by influencers online.

name: ViTTE Contour Copilot
description: The idea behind ViTTE is to augment the radiotherapy treatment process by offering a tool that can automatically contour at-risk organs more efficiently than current methods using generative AI.

name: EKKO Ecommerce Chatbot
description: This is a project that demonstrates my capabilities of using vector embeddings to create a chatbot that can recommend products based on user input in natural language.

name: Geobrowser
description: This is proprietary software for GMV. It's a web-based geospatial data visualization tool.

name: E-commerce App UI
description: This is a simple e-commerce app UI that allows users to view marketing metrics and orders.
